DOC.brief_summary: Effect of natural cesarean section in comparison to traditional cesarean section on maternal and fetal recovery.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Natural Cesarean Section on Breastfeeding
DOC.criteria: 1. primigravida or para one section 2. full term 3. cephalic 4. single baby 5. average weight 6. spinal anathesia 1. High risk pregnancy. 2. Women with known or suspected fetal malformation. 3. Women with uterine malformations. 4. Breech or transverse lie. 5. Emergency caesarean section. 6. Previous two or more caesarean section
